name: Foundry
long_description:
Foundry is the AWS for AI agents, providing startups with the core infrastructure to build, evaluate, and improve their agents.

Our first product is a best-in-class, human-in-the-loop eval system that delivers up to 40% higher accuracy than standalone evals. It helps teams pinpoint failure points, optimize performance, and ensure agents improve over time.

Pranav and I previously worked at Scale AI, helping top AI labs like OpenAI improve their models. Now, weâ€™re building the infrastructure startups need to succeed in the agent-driven future.
